automaticVAD._comment: Automatic Voice Activity Detection. Gemini will automatically detect when user starts/stops speaking.

audio._comment: Audio format specifications. chunkSizeBytes: 100ms at 16kHz mono 16-bit PCM

timeouts._comment: Operation timeouts. sendTimeoutSeconds: timeout for sending messages to Gemini. setupTimeoutSeconds: timeout for session setup

captions._comment: Uses Gemini's built-in output_audio_transcription feature. Backend always sends transcriptions. Frontend CC toggle controls display (default: OFF).

initialContext._comment: Optional: Send backstory/setlist as first message. Disabled by default since system_instruction already includes persona. Live API does NOT support context caching.
